import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import './Booking.css'; const apiuser = 'http://localhost:9999/user' const apiBooking = "http://localhost:9999/booking" export default class Booking extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.onSubmitBooking = this.onSubmitBooking.bind(this) this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); this.state= { id: "", create_from : Date, create_to : Date, room_id: "" } } handleChange(e) { this.setState({room_id: e.target.value}); } handleSubmit(event) { alert('Your favorite flavor is: ' + this.state.room_id); event.preventDefault(); } componentWillMount(){ const config = { headers: { Authorization : localStorage.getItem('token') } } // api axios นำ email มาแสดง axios.get(apiuser,config) .then( res => { // เซต Email มาแสดง this.setState({ id: res.data[0].id }) }, err => { console.log(err) } ) } onSubmitBooking(){ const configBooking = { headers: { Authorization : localStorage.getItem('token'), 'Content-Type': 'application/json', } } const data = { user_id : this.id, create_from : this.create_from, create_to : this.create_to, room_id : this.room_id } console.log("StartBooking" , this.state.create_from) console.log("EndBooking" , this.state.create_to) console.log("room_id", this.state.room_id) console.log("id", this.state.id ) axios.post(apiBooking,JSON.stringify(dataBooking),configBooking) .then( res => { console.log(res) }, err => { console.log(err) } ) } render() { console.log("render Booking id: ", this.state.id) return (
this.setState({ id : e.target.value })} /> this.setState({ create_from : e.target.value })} />
this.setState({ create_to : e.target.value })} />
